Virtual
Virtual :: module

Contains functions for working with threads

Functions
task
task :: (
fx
)

Executes a closure in a virtual thread

Parameters
fx

The closure to execute

Returns

A handle to the thread executing.  This handle can be used to get the result of the closure

sleep
sleep :: (
ms
)

Pauses the current thread

Parameters
ms

Amount to pause by, in milliseconds

Returns

A Unit value

await
await :: (
task
)

Waits for the virtual thread to finish and gets the result

Parameters
task

The task handle

Returns

The result of the thread.
